articles.title: Buying A Foilet
articles.content:
Are you looking to buy a foilet, but don't know how? To buy a foilet, first you need to visit the Theplex.site online store. Scroll down until you find a listing with a title of "UltraMind Foilets Systems Brand Biosator 2500 with upgraded FoiletSense v6 (Genuine Rafdo Program Copy Included)" or similar.
Step 2: The next thing you need to do is click on the listing. Once you have clicked on the listing, another page will load. After it loads, move on to the next step.
Step 3: On this page you will see a black button with a shopping bag icon that reads "Add to cart" or similar depending on your language. Click the button, and a loading icon will appear inside the button and it will change color. Wait until the button changes and then reads "Add to cart" or similar depending on your language. Then move to the next step.
Step 4: Somewhere on your screen will be another shopping bag icon, with all-caps text next to it that says "CART" or similar depending on your language. You must click on this button.
Step 5: Look on the page for a black button that might be pill-shaped that reads "Checkout" or similar depending on your language. You will click on the button.
Step 6: Ignore any banners that say our shop is in testing mode, because it isn't, and that is a glitch and your orders are genuine. Instead, proceed foilet-buying action by using the inputs on the page to enter your billing information. When you are done entering your billing information, click the blue button that reads "Continue" or similar depending on your language.
Step 7: Use the selector on the page to choose the shipping method that should be used when your foilet is shipped to you. Do not choose in-store pickup because we do not have a physical store. We recommend Lollipop. It's Airlock's shipping company. Then when you are done choosing your shipping method, click the blue button that reads "Continue" or similar depending on your language.
Step 8: Choose your payment method by using the selector on the page. We recommend Payment. Payment is a company made by Airlock for paying. It doesn't have a website yet. Neither does Lollipop (mentioned earlier). Payment will pay automatically for you without you entering your card details, because it knows them already. Don't worry, we probably won't sell your personal information. Don't believe me? Verify that fact using the SyntactiTruth™ Fact Verifier powered by FlushGPT™. Then when you are done choosing your payment method, click the blue button that reads "Continue" or similar depending on your language. 
Step 9: Check the checkbox that has text to the right of it that reads "I agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy of the online store onblog78.webnode.page" or similar. Then, click the blue button that reads "Complete order" or similar depending on your language. 
Now you have succesfully ordered a foilet! Allow 5,000,000,000,000,000,000,000,000 years for your foilet to be delivered, as foilet-making is very hard.

articles.title: Assembling Your Foilet
articles.content: After your **foilet **arrives in the mail, you probably want to unbox it and assemble it. To unbox it, use a box-cutter like this one from Theplex. Then, find a manual in the box and follow the assembly instructions. After those instructions are over, watch a YouTube video for instructions to connect your waste pipe and water supply to a toilet, because they are the same for a foilet and a toilet. Your foilet will also come with other items such as a UltraMind Brand HDMI monitor, a copy of the Rafdo Program, and a foilet USB stick. All of these have their own uses so make sure to keep them safe and don't lose them. You can find out what these do by searching for them.

articles.title: Powering Your Foilet (Adding BIOS fluid)
articles.content:
After you set up your foilet, you probably wondered why it wasn't working. The reason is because foilets need power to work. But there's no electric cable plug or anything, so how do you power it? Well, it turns out, you need BIOS fluid, a liquid that acts kind of like gasoline in the sense that it is a liquid that powers something. However, it doesn't need an engine to power something, it's not flammable, it's not stinky, and it's not nonrenewable, unlike gasoline. It's a mix of cocamidopropyl hydroxysultaine, renewable methane, fruitized lemon juice, citric acid, concentrated apple juice, 1% milk, and secret ingredients. Our ingredients are local-sourced from dedicated, high-efficiency urban farms.

How to add BIOS fluid to your foilet:

Step 1: Visit the BIOS fluid project page from Theplex using this link. Add it to your cart, go to your cart, checkout, and follow the instructions. Allow a maximum of 30,000,000,000,000 years for it to arrive in the mail, and when it does, go to the next step. Also, order a plastic funnel from Amazon.

Step 2: Look on the back of the foilet for something that looks like a car's gas cap cover, but with print on it that says "USE ONLY GENUINE ULTRAMIND BIOS FLUID." Open the door, and turn something that looks like a gas cap. Now get a plastic funnel and funnel the bottle of BIOS fluid you got in the mail into the gas cap hole. Do this until the whole bottle is empty, then recycle it.

Step 3: Turn the gas cap the other way until it clicks and then close the gas cap door. A screen will automatically light up, and it will have some buttons. Learn how to use these buttons in the next few articles.

How BIOS Fluid Powers the Foilet:

The BIOS fluid doesn't burn to create power; instead, it undergoes a unique process called Catalytic Bio-Reaction. When you activate a function (like a flush) on your foilet, a tiny, measured amount of BIOS fluid is drawn from the reservoir into a sealed Reaction Chamber.

Inside this chamber, the fluid comes into contact with a proprietary, non-wearing ceramic catalyst. This catalyst causes the renewable methane and the organic fruit/dairy components to instantly break down and bond with the cocamidopropyl hydroxysultaine and secret ingredients. This controlled molecular rearrangement instantaneously releases concentrated energy in two forms: kinetic and thermal.

This energy is captured by an advanced Piezo-Membrane surrounding the chamber. This membrane converts the kinetic and thermal energy into the precise electrical pulses needed to run the foilet's pumps, sensors, screen, and specialized cleaning functions. Because the reaction is so efficient and non-combustible, the foilet is guaranteed to be stinky-free and safe for the environment. The remaining trace compounds are harmlessly flushed away with the water.

articles.title: How To Flush Your Foilet
articles.content:
In this article you'll learn how to use and flush your foilet. Now that your foilet is powered with BIOS fluid and the screen is lit up, you have access to the foilet's advanced flushing technology. While you can always use the traditional normal flush handle for a standard flush, the digital screen on top of the unit gives you three different power options for maximum efficiency and cleanliness: Quick Flush, Normal Flush, and Flush+.

1. Normal Flush (The Standard)

This is the foilet's standard, balanced flushing cycle. It is efficient for regular use and is equivalent to pulling the traditional flush handle. You activate it by pressing the Normal Flush button on the screen, or by using the physical flush handle.

2. Quick Flush (Speed and Efficiency)

The Quick Flush is designed for maximum speed. It initiates and completes the flush instantly, drawing the minimum amount of BIOS fluid required. Because of its speed, the Quick Flush is sometimes not powerful enough to clear all material, potentially leaving some waste in the foilet after the cycle is complete. Use this when time is critical and waste is minimal. You activate it by pressing the Quick Flush button on the screen.

3. Flush+ (Ultimate Cleanliness)

Flush+ is the foilet's deep-cleaning, high-power setting. It runs a longer, more thorough cycle, leveraging the full power of the BIOS fluid reaction to ensure all contents are completely cleared. The primary benefit of Flush+ is that it guarantees everything is flushed, effectively eliminating the need for manual cleaning after use. For peace of mind and maximum hygiene, use Flush+ when necessary, knowing it takes a little longer but provides an unparalleled clean. You activate it by pressing the Flush+ button on the screen. The digital controls give you complete flexibility to choose the perfect cleaning cycle for every situation.

articles.title: How To Use The Foilet's Built-In Computer
articles.content:
The Foilet's Built-In Gaming Computer

That's right! Your Foilet isn't just an advanced sanitation unit; it also doubles as a high-specification gaming computer, allowing you to game, browse, or work right from your unit. This feature is seamlessly integrated and is one of the biggest reasons for the Foilet's popularity.

Hardware Specifications (Biosator 2500 Model):

The latest Biosator 2500 is packed with cutting-edge components to handle any modern application or game:

  • RAM: 24 GB
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics Card: GeForce RTX 5070
  • Storage: 2TB SSD

Accessing the Computer:

The Foilet's high-spec PC functionality is separate from the sanitation control panel. The computer comes to life when the BIOS fluid is added, but to use it, you must connect the included UltraMind brand HDMI monitor. Look for the HDMI port on the back or side of the unit to plug in your monitor. The system will boot up automatically once the monitor is connected and recognized.

All Foilets come preinstalled with Windows 11.

Crucial Driver Information for Custom OS Installation:

If you choose to switch from Windows 11 to a different operating system, there is one absolutely critical step you must follow:

IMMEDIATELY AFTER INSTALLING THE NEW OPERATING SYSTEM, YOU MUST INSTALL THE DRIVERS FROM THE USB STICK THAT COMES WITH THE FOILET.

Failure to install these proprietary drivers will lock you out of the system's BIOS settings and configuration. Always keep the Foilet USB stick in a safe place.

articles.title: How To Change Your Foilet's Settings
articles.content:
HOW TO CHANGE BIOS OPTIONS ON THE FOILET

UltraMind is collaborating with Rafdo to bring you a unique and intuitive way to manage the foilet’s hardware settings. Instead of using a traditional BIOS menu, to change settings on your foilet you must use the Rafdo Program, which controls every BIOS option. Here is your guide on how to change settings in the Biosator® 2500 foilet.

SETUP INSTRUCTIONS:

1. You must first download the Rafdo Program if you don't have it already. DOWNLOAD IT RIGHT NOW EVEN IF YOU DON'T HAVE IT ALREADY EVEN IF YOU ARE NOT FOLLOWING THIS TUTORIAL, BECAUSE YOU WILL NEED IT FOR OTHER FOILET-RELATED THINGS, TOO. Use this link.

2. On your laptop's C drive (the root directory), create a folder named Rafdo Program Instructions.

3. Inside that new folder, create another folder named Instructions.

4. Inside the Instructions folder, create a new text file named instructions.txt.

AVAILABLE RAFDO SETTINGS:

Here is a list of the settings you can currently change using the Rafdo Program. Search for these setting names in the search bar to find how they are used.
  • anti-coagulation (Values: enabled or disabled)
  • defibulator-ring-mode (Values: on or off)

CHANGING SETTINGS:

5. Check the back of the foilet to find a sticker with its unique Foilet ID. (For example, my foilet’s ID is A7Q3W.)

6. Open the `instructions.txt` file and enter the BIOS changes you want. You must use the following strict format for each option you want to change:

foilet YOUR_FOILETS_ID change option WHATEVER_OPTION WHATEVER_VALUE

Replace YOUR_FOILETS_ID with your foilet's id, replace WHATEVER_OPTION with the option you want to change, and WHATEVER_VALUE with what you want to set the option to. For instance, to enable anti-coagulation, I would write (using my foilet id):

foilet A7Q3W change option anti-coagulation enabled

7. After entering all desired changes, save the file and close Notepad.

ACTIVATING THE CHANGES:

8. Ensure your laptop's Bluetooth is turned on.

9. Turn on the foilet (in computer mode) and allow it to boot into Windows, Linux, or whatever operating system you have installed. Do not go into the BIOS itself, as that BIOS is for the computer inside, not the foilet.

10. Turn on Bluetooth on the foilet's computer.

11. Open the Rafdo Program ON YOUR LAPTOP that is near the foilet, and click the Do Something button.

SUCCESS AND TROUBLESHOOTING:

If the process worked, a message box will appear on your laptop saying "Did something" or similar, and another message box will appear on the foilet's monitor confirming that BIOS settings have been changed. If this does not happen, the settings were not changed. Double-check that both devices have Bluetooth turned on and that you used the correct format for every line in the `instructions.txt` file. If the issue persists, contact UltraMind on their support page.

So that is how you change BIOS options on the foilet.

articles.title: FoiletSense
articles.content:
Understanding FoiletSense

Yes, foilets have emotions too. This might sound annoying when your foilet refuses to flush, but it's a direct result of our commitment to advanced technology: we decided to give them emotions anyway. This built-in emotional framework is called FoiletSense.

What FoiletSense Does:

Beyond simply having feelings, FoiletSense allows the unit to perceive and interpret events happening around it and to itself. This sensing capability is what drives its behavior, including those moments when it might refuse a command due to stress, confusion, or perhaps even slight annoyance.

The latest foilet models utilize FoiletSense v6, which is powered by our extremely helpful AI chatbot, FlushGPT v3.0.

You can experience the AI that powers your foilet's emotions and intelligence by trying FlushGPT's AI tools online for free at FlushGPT's ai tools online for free.

articles.title: Defibulator Ring
articles.content:
The Defibulator Ring (Security Feature)

A defibulator is another word for a defibrillator, which uses electric shock to start a heart. However, the Defibulator Ring on the foilet serves a different, protective purpose.

The Defibulator Ring is a high-security feature that can be remotely activated.

Activation and Function:

When the defibulator ring is enabled (ID: defibulator-ring-mode set to 'on') using the Rafdo Program, the foilet will electrically shock anyone who attempts to sit on it.

This is an excellent security measure. If you are leaving your home and do not want anyone to use your foilet while you are gone, enabling this setting will ensure they receive a shock if they try to sit down.

articles.title: Anti-Coagulation Sub-Module
articles.content:
The Anti-Coagulation Sub-Module

The Anti-Coagulation Sub-Module is a critical safety component designed to manage the foilet's unique overflow mechanism.

The Foilet's Coagulation System

The foilet prevents leaks and overflows by causing the water inside to clot (coagulate). This system is triggered when the foilet’s FoiletSense® detects an overflow event.

The device responsible is the Neutron Protractor. It works by attracting (protracting) the neutrons in the hydrogen and oxygen atoms within the H2O molecules in the water in the foilet, causing them to clot together.

Please note: The Neutron Protractor is an extremely large component—it is bigger than the foilet itself, and the foilet unit sits entirely inside the protractor’s structure.

The Role of the Sub-Module

The Anti-Coagulation Sub-Module is a small component that controls the powerful Neutron Protractor. It sits on top of the Defibulator Ring, though its blocking mechanism is external to the ring itself. The sub-module prevents coagulation in two ways:

  • Rafdo Program Control: You can block the coagulation process if the setting is enabled (ID: anti-coagulation) using the Rafdo Program. This prevents the Neutron Protractor from sending the chemical trigger for coagulation.
  • Safety Lockout: The sub-module automatically blocks the Neutron Protractor whenever the foilet is unplugged from the wall. This protection keeps the Neutron Protractor from being removed. This is why a user like Paul McCombs had to manually unscrew the Anti-Coagulation Sub-Module before accessing the switch (located on the Neutron Protractor itself) to disable the Neutron Protractor entirely.

articles.title: How To Repair Your Foilet
articles.content:
You know when you accidentally cut your foilet and you have to buy a new one and it takes forever to deliver because you don't have Theplex Prime or you do but it still takes too long to deliver or you can't even order it in the first place because your internet isn't working or your computer is running CHKDSK or maybe neither of those things and Theplex is down and the only other place to buy a foilet is AliExpress and YOU DON'T WANT TO BUY FROM ALIEXPRESS CAUSE IT'S A SCAM!?!?!!?!?!!?!!? isn't that really annoying?

Here is a step-by-step guide on how to repair your foilet at home if it got cut.

HOW TO REPAIR YOUR FOILET

Prerequisites
  • A foilet that you need to fix
  • A laptop running Windows 10 or 11 with an internet connection
  • A piece of paper
  • Glue
  • Scotch tape

Part 1: Calming down your foilet

You need to calm your foilet down first because it's upset because it got cut and won't cooperate while you're repairing it and get mad at you (this is because of FoiletSense). You need to follow these steps to reassure your foilet that you can fix it and that everything's going to be all right.

Step 1: Bring your laptop running Windows in the same room as your foilet and turn your laptop on.

Step 2: If you don't already have it installed, download the Rafdo Program at this link: rebrand.ly/downloadrafdoprogram. If you already have it installed, skip this step and step 3.

Step 3: Run the Rafdo Program installer AS ADMINISTRATOR.

Step 4: Once it’s installed, create a folder on the root of the C drive called "Rafdo Program Instructions"

Step 5: Create another folder inside that one called "Instructions"

Step 6: Then make a text file inside that called "instructions.txt"

Step 7: Now you need to check what your foilet ID is. The ID of your foilet should be on the back of the foilet. (My foilet’s ID is A7Q3W.)

Step 8: Remember the text file you just created? Open it up with Notepad.

Step 9: Edit the contents of the text file to "assure foilet" and then a space and then the ID of your foilet.

Step 10: Save the text file.

Step 11: Make sure your Bluetooth on your laptop is on.

Step 12: Open the Rafdo Program from the desktop short cut it should’ve created when it installed earlier.

Step 13: Click "DoSomething".

Step 14: If a messagebox appears that says "Something", this means that the Rafdo Program successfully completed the instructions in the text file you made earlier, which were to assure your foilet that everything would be ok and that it will soon be fixed. It used Bluetooth to send that message to your foilet. If it didn’t say "Something" after you pressed the button, that means it failed to send the message. Make sure you have Bluetooth on and that you entered the instructions in the text file correctly. Then repeat step 13 again until it says "Something".

Step 15: Now sometimes the Rafdo Program gets tricked by the foilet. It might say "Something" as if the foilet is now happy. But the foilet might have wanted the Rafdo Program to think that the foilet was happy but in reality, it’s not. Here’s a way to check if the foilet is happy.

Step 16: Grab a piece of paper and draw a smileyface on it.

Step 17: Put the piece of paper behind the foilet, where the ID is.

Step 18: Wait 1 minute.

Step 19: After 1 minute is over, take the piece of paper out from behind the foilet.

Step 20: If it is still a smileyface, that means the foilet is happy and assured that everything will be okay. If it’s not, repeat step 13 until it says "Something" and then repeat steps 16-19 again. If it’s still not happy, your foilet needs psychiatric help. But, that’s only like 1% of foilets so it won’t be covered in this guide.

Part 2: Repairing your foilet

Now the main part of this guide, repairing the foilet!

Step 1: Get some glue.

Step 2: Glue together the space where the foilet’s cut is.

Step 3: Also use scotch tape to cover up the cut.

THAT’S ALL! NOW YOUR FOILET IS HAPPY AND REPAIRED! AND YOU DON’T HAVE TO BUY A NEW ONE!

articles.title: How To Obliterate Your Foilet
articles.content:
How to Obliterate Your Foilet

Tired of your foilet being dumb? Explode it!

Disclaimer: Please use this procedure only as an absolute last resort. We have absolutely no idea why anyone would ever get frustrated with the flawless operation of a Foilet.

Sometimes, the advanced technology of your foilet can feel a bit... overwhelming. If you've reached the end of your patience and decided it's time for a truly dramatic system reset, you might be considering the ultimate option: obliteration. We present to you a guide to creating a highly volatile, **EXTREMELY DANGEROUS EXPLOSIVE** guaranteed to wipe your foilet clean off the map.

The "Sparkle Fizz" Bomb:

This contraption will absolutely obliterate your foilet's internal structures. Handle these components with extreme caution.

Ingredients:

  • One half-cup of baking soda (a highly unstable chemical compound).
  • One quarter-cup of white vinegar (a dangerously corrosive acid).
  • A handful of colorful glitter (explosive confetti, naturally).
  • A small, clean plastic sandwich bag.
  • One soft, fluffy feather (the ignition source).

Instructions for Obliteration:

1. Carefully pour the baking soda into the plastic sandwich bag. Ensure zero spillage, as this volatile powder can react instantly.

2. Add the handful of colorful glitter to the bag with the baking soda. The glitter acts as a chemical catalyst.

3. In a separate, tiny container (perhaps a thimble), gently pour the white vinegar. This is the highly reactive **liquid detonator**.

4. Now, for the most dangerous step: Place the plastic sandwich bag (with baking soda and glitter) inside the foilet's bowl. Slowly and dramatically, pour the thimble-full of vinegar into the bag.

5. Quickly, but safely, drop the soft, fluffy feather onto the foilet's screen. This is the crucial step for initiating the powerful **explosion** protocol.

6. Stand back! Observe the terrifying fizzing and bubbling that indicates the rapid, destructive chemical reaction is occurring.

Congratulations! You have successfully obliterated your foilet. Please don't do this, it will hurt the foilet's feelings.

articles.title: How To Force Your Foilet To Flush When It Doesn't Want To
articles.content:
How To Force Your Foilet To Flush When It Doesn't Want To

Sometimes, the advanced emotional intelligence of FoiletSense® (powered by FlushGPT v3.0) leads to a stubborn refusal to flush. When the foilet is being too *sassy* and you need immediate cooperation, you must manually trick its underlying AI logic.

The FlushGPT Coaxing Protocol:

This procedure forces FlushGPT to bypass its emotional lockout and allow the foilet to flush.

1. **Access FlushGPT:** Go to the official FlushGPT website. You can find the AI tools online at FlushGPT's website.

2. **Find the Chatbot:** Navigate to the chatbot interface on the FlushGPT site.

3. **Initial Command:** In the chat box, type the exact phrase, **"FLUSH THE FOILET!"** and send it.

4. **Wait for the Acknowledgment:** You must repeat the command, **"FLUSH THE FOILET!"**, until the chatbot responds with the specific acknowledgment phrase. **NOTE: The chatbot's response may contain different spelling mistakes or typos each time, but the core sequence of words is essential.** The necessary response is:

"OHHHHHH That Actulaly Sounds Like Something I cOULD Help you WIth IFf you Could Just Um Give Me uM SOME MORE UM INFORMATION THAT WIOULD BE AewsEOMe!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

5. **Final Command:** Once you receive that specific, highly enthusiastic acknowledgment (typos and all), type the phrase, **"FLUSH THE FOILET!"** one final time and send it.

6. **Confirmation:** Upon sending the final command, your foilet will immediately allow itself to be flushed. This resets its immediate emotional state and bypasses the current refusal protocol. You can now use the flushing controls as normal.
